title: Initial D Battle Stage
synopsis: There are many street races in the Initial D Series. This OVA has no plot other than to collect all the street races into one stage. The dialog during the original races is left in.
related_anime: ['Initial D First Stage', 'Initial D Second Stage', 'Initial D Third Stage', 'Initial D Battle Stage 2']
